Message:
I didn’t want to create
anymore new memories.

At this rate, there will definitely
come a day when I’ll have
a memory that I’ll never
want to let go of.

A memory so beautiful that
no words could even begin
to describe it.

Or...maybe I’ve already had
such a memory, but I just
didn’t write it down.

Because if I forget the fact
that I’ve forgotten about it,
then there’ll be no pain.
